member.name: T:ReaService.Orleans.Api.Api
member.summary: The FabricRuntime creates an instance of this class for each service type instance.

member.name: M:ReaService.Orleans.Api.Api.CreateServiceInstanceListeners
member.summary: Optional override to create listeners (like tcp, http) for this service instance.

member.name: T:ReaService.Orleans.Api.Controllers.ControllerBaseExt
member.summary: Provides additional application specific helpers for returning status codes.

member.name: M:ReaService.Orleans.Api.StringExtensions.ToLowerInvariantWithTemplate(System.String,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Returns a copy of this string converted to lowercase, skipping letters that fall between the template indicators.
member.param: The string to convert. This method is available on the string as an extension method.
The char that indicates the start of a template. The default is '{'
The char that indicates the end of a template. The default is '}'
member.returns: A string in lowercase except for the templates.

member.name: M:ReaService.Orleans.Api.Program.Main
member.summary: This is the entry point of the service host process.
